name: Endless Ruin Chapter II: Hall of Spores
name_original: Endless Ruin Chapter II: Hall of Spores
description:
Endless Ruin Chapter II:
Hall of Spores

an interactive music video

Please play with the sound on, as music is a primary component of the experience.

-Made with Bitsy

-Made with assets from the Bitsy Dungeon Tiles asset pack by enui

-music added using the Bitsy Audio tool by Mark Wonnacott

-music, writing, and everything else by (is)
